title: Girls' Shoes
question_text:
The graph below shows the distribution of the number of shoes for a group of $37\text{ girls}$.
Which of the following choices BEST estimates the mean and standard deviation of the distribution?

Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.

with a standard deviation of around

The mean and standard deviation cannot be estimated because the distribution is not nearly normal.
